profile_positions.description:
As a teacher of history I organize many excursions to Amsterdam, The Hague and the European Parliament in Strassbourg. Because I have also a degree in art-history I taught the subject CKV (Arts) for a couple of years.
At my school I organize exchanges with schools in Italy (Venice) and Spain (Sevilla).
profile_positions.title: Teacher of History and Coordinator International Exchanges
